feed.author: Joel Goodman & Jon-Stephen Stansel
feed.description: Deep thoughts, critique, and solutions for higher education digital marketers. Joel Goodman and Jon-Stephen Stansel host this program that questions the status quo of digital marketing in higher ed and makes recommendations for progressing and improving every institution's efforts.
